Class CountyInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • CountyInfo

  • public class CountyInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Store information about a single county.

    Project 5
    Date: 2015-11-11

    Author:
    CS2334. Modified by ???

    • Constructor Detail

      • CountyInfo

        public CountyInfo(java.lang.String[] elements,
          double scaleX,
          double scaleY)
        Constructor.

        Elements array contains: 0. The name of the county 1/2: long/lat of first point in the polygon. 3/4: long/lat of the 2nd point, ...

        The number of long/lat coordinates is not assumed to be known ahead of time.

        Parameters:
        elements - Elements that define the county.
        scaleX - Scale translation from long/lat to screen coordinates
        scaleY - Scale translation from long/lat to screen coordinates

        Draw the county in the g2 context
        Parameters:

      • translate

        protected void translate(int deltaX,
             int deltaY)
        Move the polygon by some amount.
        Parameters:
        deltaX - Screen units to change X position by
        deltaY - Screen units to change Y position by

        Determine whether a point in screen coordinates is in the the polygon

        Returns:
